data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 15,087 believers in the state of Sevastopol' to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sevastopol‘, Ukraine

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 15,087 believers in Sevastopol', please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sevastopol‘, Ukraine to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sevastopol‘, Ukraine. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, I pray that all the Avar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Avar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Avar people is yours.
Jesus, make the 287,752 people in the state of Sevastopol' who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 15,087 believers in Sevastopol' that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sevastopol‘, Ukraine has a population of 416,300.

We estimate Sevastopol' has 15,087 people who might know Jesus, 287,752 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 113,461 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Sevastopol‘, Ukraine to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
